title: Ticket #1456: git.condorproject.org doesn't work for cloning
description:
git clone http://git.condorproject.org/repos/condor.git
doesn't work, failing with a variety of cryptic errors. What does work is: 

git clone http://condor-git.cs.wisc.edu/repos/condor.git

Ideally git.condorproject.org should be fixed to work fine with git, but if that's not possible we need to make sure we don't document git.condorproject.org, possibly going so far as to remove the hostname as it is likely to confuse others.
